title: Cache backend: Crash when a / character is written as the root dir
body:
## Version
rclone v1.39
os/arch: linux/amd64
go version: go1.9.2

## Command
The commands that crashes with the cache backend works fine for plain or encrypted gdrive.

### Crashes (see log below):
rclone lsd gdrive_cached:/
rclone lsd gdrive_cached:/any_directory

### Lists directories successfully:
rclone lsd gdrive_cached:
rclone lsd gdrive_cached:any_directory
## Log

```
2017/12/26 12:29:45 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/user/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2017/12/26 12:29:45 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.39" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "lsd" "gdrive_cached:/"]
2017/12/26 12:29:46 DEBUG : gdrive_cached: wrapped gdrive:media at root /
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Cache DB path: /home/user/.cache/rclone/cache-backend/gdrive_cached.db
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Cache chunk path: /home/user/.cache/rclone/cache-backend/gdrive_cached
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Chunk Memory: true
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Chunk Size: 5M
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Chunk Total Size: 10G
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Chunk Clean Interval: 1m0s
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Workers: 4
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: File Age: 6h0m0s
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached: Cache Writes: false
2017/12/26 12:29:46 INFO  : gdrive_cached:/: Modify window is 1ms
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range

goroutine 40 [running]:
```
